data_table.description: Outcomes - Clinical Trials (CT) + Observational Study (OS) Adjudicated data file. Verified outcomes for OS and CT include all cancers, fractures (all fractures for CT; hip fracture only for OS), and cardiovascular outcomes, except DVT and PE. DVT and PE are only verified for HT participants. The outcomes for which central adjudication is required for all OS and CT participants are hip fracture, in situ breast, invasive breast, colon, endometrium, ovary, rectosigmoid junction and rectum cancers. In addition, for CT participants, central adjudication is required for death. MI, Stroke, DVT, and PE are centrally adjudicated for HT participants only. Note: The rel# in the file name is used by the submitter to track embargo releases. Files that have "rel2" or later may either contain additional variables or more recent data as compared to the previous rel#.

variable.name: ANGINA
variable.comment: Angina was adjudicated for CT and OS participants during the core WHI study. Angina occurring on or after a Clinical MI is not counted.

variable.name: ANGINADY
variable.comment: Days enrollment to Angina

variable.name: ANGINASRC
variable.comment: Angina was only adjudicated locally.

variable.name: AANEUR
variable.comment: Started collecting this outcome in Ext2. It is only adjudicated for the Medical Record Cohort.

variable.name: AANEURDY
variable.comment: Days enrollment to Aortic Aneurysm

variable.name: ADISSECT
variable.comment: Started collecting this outcome in Ext2. It is only adjudicated for the Medical Record Cohort.

variable.name: ADISSECTDY
variable.comment: Days enrollment to Aortic Dissection

variable.name: AFIBR
variable.comment: Started collecting this outcome in Ext2. It is only adjudicated for the Medical Record Cohort.

variable.name: AFIBRDY
variable.comment: Days enrollment to Atrial Fibrillation

variable.name: CABG
variable.comment: Coronary Artery Bypass Graft (CABG) CABG was adjudicated for CT and OS participants through Ext1. In Ext2 it is only adjudicated for the Medical Record Cohort.

variable.name: CABGDY
variable.comment: Days enrollment to CABG

variable.name: CABGSRC
variable.comment: During the core WHI study, only local adjudications were done for CABG. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: CAROTID
variable.comment: Carotid Artery Disease was adjudicated for CT and OS participants through Ext1. In Ext2 It is only adjudicated for the Medical Record Cohort. Carotid Artery Disease occurring on or after a Stroke is not counted.

variable.name: CAROTIDDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Carotid Artery Disease
variable.comment: Days enrollment to Carotid Artery Disease

variable.name: CAROTIDSRC
variable.comment: During the core WHI study, only local adjudications were done for Carotid Artery Disease. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: CHD
variable.comment: Coronary Heart Disease (CHD) Defined as the first occurrence of Clinical MI, Definite Silent MI or a Death due to Definite CHD or Possible CHD. Clinical MI and Death were adjudicated for CT and OS ppts through Ext1. In Ext2 they are only adjudicated for the Medical Record Cohort. Definite Silent MI was only adjudicated for CT participants during the core WHI study. See the DEATH and DEATHSRC variables for details about the death adjudication process.

variable.name: CHDDY
variable.comment: Days enrollment to CHD

variable.name: CHDSRC
variable.comment: The ascertainment processes vary for these outcomes. Refer to their usage notes. See the DEATH and DEATHSRC variables for details about the death adjudication process.

variable.name: CHF
variable.comment: Congestive Heart Failure (CHF) CHF was adjudicated for CT and OS participants during the core WHI study.

variable.name: CHFDY
variable.comment: Days enrollment to CHF

variable.name: CHFSRC
variable.comment: CHF was only adjudicated locally.

variable.name: MI
variable.comment: Clinical MI was adjudicated for CT and OS participants through Ext1. In Ext2 it is only adjudicated for the Medical Record Cohort.

variable.name: MIDY
variable.comment: Days enrollment to Clinical MI

variable.name: MISRC
variable.comment: During the core WHI study, central adjudications of Clinical MI were only done for HT participants. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: CREVASC
variable.comment: Coronary revascularization procedure (CABG or PTCA) Defined as the first occurrence of CABG or PTCA. Coronary Revascularization was adjudicated for CT and OS participants through Ext1. In Ext2 it is only adjudicated for the Medical Record Cohort.

variable.name: CREVASCDY
variable.comment: Days enrollment to Coronary Revascularization

variable.name: CREVASCSRC
variable.comment: During the core WHI study, only local adjudications were done for Coronary Revascularization. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: DSMI
variable.comment: Defined as an ECG with an evolving Q-wave MI based on an incident Novacode of 5.1 or 5.2. ECGs were adjudicated for CT participants at baseline, av3, av6 and av9. Definite Silent MI occurring on or after a Clinical MI is not counted.

variable.name: DSMIDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Definite Silent MI
variable.comment: Days enrollment to Definite Silent MI

variable.name: DVT
variable.comment: Deep Vein Thrombosis (DVT) DVT was only adjudicated for HT participants until Ext2. In Ext2 it is adjudicated for the Medical Record Cohort. Includes both outpatient and inpatient DVTs.

variable.name: DVTDY
variable.comment: Days enrollment to DVT

variable.name: DVTSRC
variable.comment: During the core WHI study, central adjudications of DVT were only done for HT participants. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: HEARTVALVE
variable.comment: Moderate to severe valvular disease involving one or more valves Started collecting this outcome in Ext2. It is only adjudicated for the Medical Record Cohort.

variable.name: HEARTVALVEDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Heart Valve Disease
variable.comment: Days enrollment to Heart Valve Disease

variable.name: STRKHEMO
variable.comment: Defined as a Stroke where the diagnosis question indicates a hemorrhagic stroke. Hemorrhagic Stroke was adjudicated for CT and OS participants through Ext1. In Ext2 it is only adjudicated for the Medical Record Cohort. Strokes from cause of death, Form 121 and early versions of 132 were not able to determine Hemorrhagic/Ischemic classification. Includes inpatient strokes for the core WHI study and inpatient and outpatient strokes after the core study closeout.

variable.name: STRKHEMODY
variable.comment: Days enrollment to Hemorrhagic Stroke

variable.name: STRKHEMOSRC
variable.comment: In order to be able to classify strokes, WHI uses central adjudications if possible, even though during the core WHI study Strokes were only fully centrally adjudicated in HT participants.

variable.name: STRKISCH
variable.comment: Defined as a Stroke where the diagnosis question indicates an iscemic stroke. Ischemic Stroke was adjudicated for CT and OS participants through Ext1. In Ext2 it is only adjudicated for the Medical Record Cohort. Strokes from cause of death, Form 121 and early versions of 132 were not able to determine Hemorrhagic/Ischemic classification. Includes inpatient strokes for the core WHI study and inpatient and outpatient strokes after the core study closeout.

variable.name: STRKISCHDY
variable.comment: Days enrollment to Ischemic Stroke

variable.name: STRKISCHSRC
variable.comment: In order to be able to classify strokes, WHI uses central adjudications if possible, even though during the core WHI study Strokes were only fully centrally adjudicated in HT participants.

variable.name: PERIPH
variable.comment: Peripheral Arterial Disease (PAD) PAD was adjudicated for CT and OS participants through Ext1. In Ext2 it is only adjudicated for the Medical Record Cohort.

variable.name: PERIPHDY
variable.comment: Days enrollment to PAD

variable.name: PERIPHSRC
variable.comment: During the core WHI study, only local adjudications were done for PAD. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: PE
variable.comment: Pulmonary Embolism (PE) Defined as the first occurrence of PE or a Death due to Pulmonary Embolism. PE was only adjudicated for HT participants until Ext2. In Ext2 it is adjudicated for the Medical Record Cohort. See the DEATH and DEATHSRC variables for details about the death adjudication process.

variable.name: PEDY
variable.comment: Days enrollment to PE

variable.name: PESRC
variable.comment: Central adjudications were done for PE. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used. See the DEATH and DEATHSRC variables for details about the death adjudication process.

variable.name: PSMI
variable.comment: Defined as an ECG with an evolving Q-wave MI based on an incident Novacode of 5.3 or 5.4. ECGs were adjudicated for CT participants at baseline, av3, av6 and av9. Possible Silent MI occurring on or after a Clinical MI or Definite Silent MI is not counted.

variable.name: PSMIDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Possible Silent MI
variable.comment: Days enrollment to Possible Silent MI

variable.name: PTCA
variable.comment: Percutaneous Transluminal Coronary Angioplasty (PTCA) PTCA was adjudicated for CT and OS participants through Ext1. In Ext2 it is only adjudicated for the Medical Record Cohort. Includes both outpatient and inpatient PTCAs.

variable.name: PTCADY
variable.comment: Days enrollment to PTCA

variable.name: PTCASRC
variable.comment: During the core WHI study, only local adjudications were done for PTCA. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: STROKE
variable.comment: Defined as the first occurrence of Stroke or a Death due to Cerebrovascular. Stroke was adjudicated for CT and OS participants through Ext1. In Ext2 it is only adjudicated for the Medical Record Cohort. In order to be able to classify strokes, WHI uses central adjudications if possible, even though Strokes were only fully centrally adjudicated in HT participants. See the DEATH and DEATHSRC variables for details about the death adjudication process. Includes inpatient strokes for the core WHI study and inpatient and outpatient strokes after the core study closeout.

variable.name: STROKEDY
variable.comment: Days enrollment to Stroke

variable.name: STROKESRC
variable.comment: In order to be able to classify strokes, WHI uses central adjudications if possible, even though during the core WHI study Strokes were only fully centrally adjudicated in HT participants. See the DEATH and DEATHSRC variables for details about the death adjudication process.

variable.name: TIA
variable.comment: Transient Ischemic Attack (TIA) TIA was adjudicated for CT and OS participants during the core WHI study. TIA occurring on or after a Stroke is not counted.

variable.name: TIADY
variable.comment: Days enrollment to TIA

variable.name: TIASRC
variable.comment: During the core WHI study, central adjudications of TIA were only done for HT participants.

variable.name: MITOTAL
variable.comment: Defined as: For CT, the first occurrence of Clinical MI or Definite Silent MI. For OS, the first Clinical MI only.

variable.name: MITOTALDY
variable.comment: Days enrollment to Total MI

variable.name: MITOTALSRC
variable.comment: The ascertainment processes vary for these outcomes. Refer to their usage notes.

variable.name: ANYCANCER
variable.comment: Defined as the first occurrence of any cancer (except non melanoma skin cancer) or a Death due to cancer. Any Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: ANYCANCERDY
variable.comment: Days enrollment to Any Cancer

variable.name: ANYCANCERSRC
variable.comment: Central adjudications were done for Any Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used. See the DEATH and DEATHSRC variables for details about the death adjudication process.

variable.name: SINUS
variable.comment: Defined as the first occurrence of Accessory Sinus Cancer or a Death due to Accessory Sinus Cancer. Accessory Sinus Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: SINUSDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Accessory Sinus Cancer
variable.comment: Days enrollment to Accessory Sinus Cancer

variable.name: SINUSSRC
variable.comment: Central adjudications were done for Accessory Sinus Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used. See the DEATH and DEATHSRC variables for details about the death adjudication process.

variable.name: ADRENALSRC
variable.comment: Central adjudications were done for Adrenal Gland Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used. See the DEATH and DEATHSRC variables for details about the death adjudication process.

variable.name: ANALSRC

variable.comment: Central adjudications were done for Appendix Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used. See the DEATH and DEATHSRC variables for details about the death adjudication process.

variable.comment: Days enrollment to Base Of Tongue Cancer

variable.description: Base Of Tongue Cancer ascertainment source
variable.comment: Central adjudications were done for Base Of Tongue Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used. See the DEATH and DEATHSRC variables for details about the death adjudication process.

variable.name: BILIARYSRC
variable.comment: Central adjudications were done for Biliary Tract Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used. See the DEATH and DEATHSRC variables for details about the death adjudication process.

variable.comment: Central adjudications were done for Bladder Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used. See the DEATH and DEATHSRC variables for details about the death adjudication process.

variable.name: BONELIMB
variable.comment: Cancer of the bones, joints or cartilage of limbs (long bones) Defined as the first occurrence of Bone-Limb Cancer or a Death due to Bone-Limb Cancer. Bone-Limb Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants. See the DEATH and DEATHSRC variables for details about the death adjudication process.

variable.name: BONELIMBDY
variable.comment: Days enrollment to Bone-Limb Cancer

variable.name: BONELIMBSRC
variable.comment: Central adjudications were done for Bone-Limb Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used. See the DEATH and DEATHSRC variables for details about the death adjudication process.

variable.name: BONENON
variable.comment: Cancer of the bones, joints or cartilage of non-limbs (face, head, torso, spine). Defined as the first occurrence of Bone-Non Limb Cancer or a Death due to Bone-Non Limb Cancer. Bone-Non Limb Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants. See the DEATH and DEATHSRC variables for details about the death adjudication process.

variable.name: BONENONDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Bone-Non Limb Cancer
variable.comment: Days enrollment to Bone-Non Limb Cancer

variable.name: BONENONSRC
variable.comment: Central adjudications were done for Bone-Non Limb Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used. See the DEATH and DEATHSRC variables for details about the death adjudication process.

variable.name: BRAIN
variable.comment: Defined as the first occurrence of Brain Cancer or a Death due to Brain Cancer. Brain Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants. See the DEATH and DEATHSRC variables for details about the death adjudication process.

variable.name: BRAINDY
variable.comment: Days enrollment to Brain Cancer

variable.name: BRAINSRC
variable.comment: Central adjudications were done for Brain Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used. See the DEATH and DEATHSRC variables for details about the death adjudication process.

variable.name: BREAST
variable.comment: Defined as the first occurrence of Invasive or In Situ Breast Cancer. All Deaths due to breast cancer are considered Invasive Breast Cancers. Breast Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants. See the DEATH and DEATHSRC variables for details about the death adjudication process.

variable.name: BREASTDY
variable.comment: Days enrollment to Breast Cancer

variable.name: BREASTSRC
variable.comment: Central adjudications were done for Breast Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used. See the DEATH and DEATHSRC variables for details about the death adjudication process.

variable.name: BREASTINV
variable.comment: Defined as a breast cancer from a Death or the first adjudication where the form 122 or 130 details indicate an invasive cancer. Breast Cancer Invasive is adjudicated for CT and OS participants. See the DEATH and DEATHSRC variables for details about the death adjudication process. WHI adjudicated all reports of breast cancer for a ppt until the first invasive Breast Cancer. i.e. The first Invasive Breast Cancer may not be the first Breast Cancer.

variable.name: BREASTINVDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Breast Cancer Invasive
variable.comment: Days enrollment to Breast Cancer Invasive

variable.name: BREASTINVSRC
variable.comment: Central adjudications were done for Breast Cancer Invasive. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used. See the DEATH and DEATHSRC variables for details about the death adjudication process.

variable.name: BREASTINSITU
variable.comment: Defined as the first breast cancer where the form 122 or 130 details indicate an in situ cancer. Breast Cancer In Situ is adjudicated for CT and OS participants. Breast Cancer In Situ occurring on or after a Breast Cancer Invasive is not counted.

variable.name: BREASTINSITUDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Breast Cancer In Situ
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Breast Cancer In Situ

variable.name: BREASTINSITUSRC
variable.description: Breast Cancer In Situ ascertainment source
variable.comment: Central adjudications were done for all Breast Cancer In Situ. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used.

variable.name: CNSCA
variable.comment: Cancer of central nervous system (not brain) Defined as the first occurrence of Central Nervous System Cancer or a Death due to Central Nervous System Cancer. Central Nervous System Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants. See the DEATH and DEATHSRC variables for details about the death adjudication process.

variable.name: CNSCADY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Central Nervous System Cancer
variable.comment: Days enrollment to Central Nervous System Cancer

variable.name: CNSCASRC
variable.description: Central Nervous System Cancer ascertainment source
variable.comment: Central adjudications were done for Central Nervous System Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used. See the DEATH and DEATHSRC variables for details about the death adjudication process.

variable.comment: Defined as the first occurrence of Cervix Cancer or a Death due to Cervix Cancer. Cervix Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants. See the DEATH and DEATHSRC variables for details about the death adjudication process.

variable.comment: Days enrollment to Cervix Cancer

variable.name: CERVICALSRC
variable.comment: Central adjudications were done for Cervix Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used. See the DEATH and DEATHSRC variables for details about the death adjudication process.

variable.name: COLONSRC
variable.comment: Central adjudications were done for Colon Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used. See the DEATH and DEATHSRC variables for details about the death adjudication process.

variable.name: COLORECTAL
variable.comment: Defined as the first occurrence of Colon Cancer, Rectosigmoid Cancer, Rectum Cancer or a Death due to Colon Cancer, Rectum Cancer or Rectosigmoid Cancer. Colorectal Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants. See the DEATH and DEATHSRC variables for details about the death adjudication process.

variable.name: COLORECTALDY
variable.comment: Days enrollment to Colorectal Cancer

variable.name: COLORECTALSRC
variable.comment: Central adjudications were done for Colorectal Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used. See the DEATH and DEATHSRC variables for details about the death adjudication process.

Connective Tissue Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants. See the DEATH and DEATHSRC variables for details about the death adjudication process.

variable.description: Days enrollment to Connective Tissue Cancer
variable.comment: Days enrollment to Connective Tissue Cancer

variable.name: CONNECTIVESRC
variable.comment: Central adjudications were done for Connective Tissue Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used. See the DEATH and DEATHSRC variables for details about the death adjudication process.

Genital Organs Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants. See the DEATH and DEATHSRC variables for details about the death adjudication process.

variable.name: ANYFX
variable.comment: Defined as the first fracture of Hip, upper leg, pelvis, knee, lower leg, ankle, foot(not toe), tailbone, spine or back, lower arm or wrist, hand (not finger), elbow, upper arm or shoulder and other. These outcomes have different adjudication rules. See the individual outcomes for details.

variable.name: ANYFXDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Any Adjudicated Fracture
variable.comment: Days enrollment to Any Adjudicated Fracture

variable.name: ANYFXSRC
variable.comment: The ascertainment processes vary for these outcomes. Refer to their usage notes.

variable.name: BKANKLE
variable.comment: Ankle Fracture was adjudicated during the core WHI study. They are adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants, but only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. Ankle Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKANKLEDY
variable.comment: Days enrollment to Ankle Fracture

variable.name: BKANKLESRC
variable.comment: Ankle Fracture was only adjudicated locally.

variable.name: BKCARPAL
variable.comment: Carpal bones in wrist Carpal Fracture was adjudicated during the core WHI study. They are adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants, but only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. Carpal Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKCARPALDY
variable.comment: Days enrollment to Carpal Fracture

variable.name: BKCARPALSRC
variable.comment: Carpal Fracture was only adjudicated locally.

variable.name: BKCLAVICLESRC
variable.comment: Clavical Fracture was only adjudicated locally.

variable.comment: Shaft of Femur Fracture was adjudicated during the core WHI study. They are adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants, but only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. Shaft of Femur Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKUPPERLEGDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Shaft of Femur Fracture
variable.comment: Days enrollment to Shaft of Femur Fracture

variable.name: BKUPPERLEGSRC
variable.description: Shaft of Femur Fracture ascertainment source
variable.comment: Shaft of Femur Fracture was only adjudicated locally.

variable.name: BKOHUMERUS
variable.comment: Fracture of humerus, shaft or unspecified part Shaft of Humerus Fracture was adjudicated during the core WHI study. They are adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants, but only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. Shaft of Humerus Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKOHUMERUSDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Shaft of Humerus Fracture
variable.comment: Days enrollment to Shaft of Humerus Fracture

variable.name: BKOHUMERUSSRC
variable.description: Shaft of Humerus Fracture ascertainment source
variable.comment: Shaft of Humerus Fracture was only adjudicated locally.

variable.name: BKFOOT
variable.comment: Tarsal or Metatarsal Fracture was adjudicated during the core WHI study. They are adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants, but only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. Tarsal or Metatarsal Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKFOOTDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Tarsal or Metatarsal Fracture
variable.comment: Days enrollment to Tarsal or Metatarsal Fracture

variable.name: BKFOOTSRC
variable.description: Tarsal or Metatarsal Fracture ascertainment source
variable.comment: Tarsal or Metatarsal Fracture was only adjudicated locally.

variable.name: BKTIBIAFIBULA
variable.comment: Tibia or Fibula Fracture was adjudicated during the core WHI study. They are adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants, but only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. Tibia or Fibula Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKTIBIAFIBULADY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Tibia or Fibula Fracture
variable.comment: Days enrollment to Tibia or Fibula Fracture

variable.name: BKTIBIAFIBULASRC
variable.description: Tibia or Fibula Fracture ascertainment source
variable.comment: Tibia or Fibula Fracture was only adjudicated locally.

variable.name: BKTIBIAL
variable.comment: Tibial Plateau Fracture was adjudicated during the core WHI study. They are adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants, but only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. Tibial Plateau Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKTIBIALDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Tibial Plateau Fracture
variable.comment: Days enrollment to Tibial Plateau Fracture

variable.name: BKTIBIALSRC
variable.comment: Tibial Plateau Fracture was only adjudicated locally.

variable.name: BKUHUMERUS
variable.comment: Upper End of Humerus Fracture was adjudicated during the core WHI study. They are adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants, but only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. Upper End of Humerus Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKUHUMERUSDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Upper End of Humerus Fracture
variable.comment: Days enrollment to Upper End of Humerus Fracture

variable.name: BKUHUMERUSSRC
variable.description: Upper End of Humerus Fracture ascertainment source
variable.comment: Upper End of Humerus Fracture was only adjudicated locally.

variable.name: BKUELBOW
variable.comment: Upper Radius/Ulna Fracture was adjudicated during the core WHI study. They are adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants, but only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. Upper Radius/Ulna Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKUELBOWDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Upper Radius/Ulna Fracture
variable.comment: Days enrollment to Upper Radius/Ulna Fracture

variable.name: BKUELBOWSRC
variable.comment: Upper Radius/Ulna Fracture was only adjudicated locally.

variable.name: BKSPINE
variable.comment: Defined as the first occurrence of Lumbar Spine Fracture or Thoracic Spine Fracture. Vertebral Fracture was adjudicated during the core WHI study. They are adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants, but only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. Does not include cervical fractures.

variable.name: BKSPINEDY
variable.comment: Days enrollment to Vertebral Fracture

variable.name: BKSPINESRC
variable.comment: Vertebral Fracture was only adjudicated locally.

variable.name: DEATH
variable.comment: Did the participant die during a consented study phase? Death was adjudicated for CT and OS participants through Ext1. In Ext2, death is only adjudicated for the Medical Record Cohort (MRC). Non MRC cause of death is determined by the initial cause of death form (form 120). See the DEATHSRC variable for details about the death adjudication process. This variable censors deaths that occur after the participant's last consented study phase, e.g. if a ppt did not consent to Ext2, but we discovered that she died during Ext2 DEATH would have a value of 0. This is done because the discovery rate of death is inconsistent after participant followup ends. See the DEATHALL variable in the All Discovered Death Outcome Detail file to see all discovered deaths.

variable.name: DEATHCAUSE
variable.comment: Unknown cause (Not yet adj)' (code 100) are reported deaths where the adjudication is in process. In Ext2 only MRC deaths are adjudicated. Non MRC cause of death is determined by the initial cause of death form (form 120). The cause of death values on form 120 are a subset of the causes of death that can be determined from a form 124._x000D_ If the form 124 was marked Other or Unknown cause of death the ICD code was used to determine cause of death (see the UNDRICD variable in the death detail file). A cross tabulation of DEATHCAUSE with UNDRICD should be examined to ascertain which ICD codes are included in each DEATHCAUSE category.

variable.name: DEATHDY
variable.comment: Days enrollment to Death

variable.name: DEATHSRC
variable.comment: During the core WHI study, central adjudications of Death were only done in the CT. In Ext1 deaths were centrally adjudicated for all participants. In Ext2, death is only adjudicated for the Medical Record Cohort (MRC). Non MRC cause of death is determined by the initial cause of death form (form 120).

variable.name: DEATHCAUSESRC
variable.comment: Cause of death is usually determined from the form 124 underlying cause of death subclass question. If this question is answered other/unknown and has an ICD code, the cause of death will be determined from the ICD code. In the case of an Ext2 SRC death, the cause of death comes from the form 120 subclass question.

variable.name: HYST
variable.comment: Hysterectomy was adjudicated for HT participants only. It was not adjudicated after Ext1.

variable.name: HYSTDY
variable.comment: Days enrollment to Hysterectomy

variable.name: HYSTSRC
variable.comment: Hysterectomy was only adjudicated locally.

variable.name: ENDWHIDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to end of WHI core study followup
variable.comment: ENDWHIDY should only be used for analyses censoring follow-up at the end of the WHI core study.

variable.name: ENDEXT1DY
variable.description: Days enrollment to end of Ext1 followup
variable.comment: ENDEXT1DY should only be used for analyses censoring follow-up at the end of Ext1.

variable.name: ENDFOLLOWDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to end of followup
variable.comment: ENDFOLLOWDY should be used for analyses utilizing all WHI, Ext1 and Ext2 follow-up.
